properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:52AM EST until January 16 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Flood Warning for the following rivers...

Salamonie River below Warren affecting Blackford...Huntington...
Jay...Wabash and Wells Counties
Ottawa River near Kalida affecting Putnam County
Blanchard River at Ottawa affecting Putnam County
Maumee River near Defiance affecting Defiance and Henry Counties
Saint Joseph River Michigan at Mottville affecting Elkhart...Cass
and St. Joseph Counties

.Heavy rain is expected to cause significant rises on area rivers
beginning late tonight into Saturday. Timing and crest heights are
still subject to change over the coming days.

The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Blanchard River at Ottawa
* from Sunday afternoon to late Wednesday night.
* At 11 AM Friday the stage was 7.5 feet and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 23.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage Sunday afternoon
and crest near 24.9 feet around  7 PM Monday January 13 and fall
below flood stage around  1 AM Wednesday January 15.
* At 25.0 feet...Flooding begins along south Walnut and west Second
Streets on the south side of Ottawa.
properties.instruction:
Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep
to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood
waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further
statements and updated forecasts.

Detailed river forecasts and more information can be found on the
internet at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.

All times are in Eastern Time. This statement will be updated in
about 24 hours or sooner if necessary.
